resources.string: Recife Fitness aims to lead a healthier and sportier life to all citizens of the metropolitan area of Recife. Teaching basics about exercise and food reeducation
Basic exercise cicle of the week

1 Bridge Lie face down on the floor on a flat surface. Raise your body by leaning on your toes and forearms keeping them parallel, in front of your head. The whole body must remain suspended, forming a kind of right triangle.
2. Chair Squats With a chair, perform the sit and stand movements 10 to 12 times per set. Try to make the movement of sitting down not too fast, strengthening the worked musculature..
